item.title: Tetris Project
item.description: Statement of Requirement state representations field 10 * 20 grid field bricks 7 types of brricks, 19 possible brick shapes. 1 + 4 + 4 + 2 + 2 + 4 + 2 O L(l) L(r) Z(l) Z(r) T I 1 4 4 2 2 4 2 state which slots of the field is filled with bricks predicates brick-action-legal-p return t if the result of an action on brick is legal.
